profile_summary:
Results-driven professional with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Highly adept in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for robust frontend and backend development. Proven capability in strategic planning and collaboration, essential for aligning engineering solutions with customer needs.
Expert in improving processes through problem solving and negotiation, ensuring compliance with industry regulations. Strong proficiency in CRM solutions and Microsoft Suite, including **Microsoft Excel**, **Microsoft Word**, and **Microsoft Outlook**, enhancing communication and customer relationship management. Demonstrated success in developing AI/ML-powered platforms focused on real-time performance and predictive analytics, while effectively deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in building microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines that drive operational efficiency.
